channel.title: Help on npc drops please?
channel.description:
ok, i have a KBD and a KQ spawn in my server (silab server btw) and im trying to get them to spawn items, the KBD is fine, he drop, but i want him to drop only 1 item at a time, and ive tried editing the npchandler, and nothing
now for the KQ, she doesnt drop anything, and im tryin to figure out how to get her to drop stuff
help would be great, thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: September 22, 2007, 03:30:21 PM[/size][hr]i would really like some help here :(

item.title: Help on npc drops please?
item.dc:creator: @Narubia Narubia
item.description:
@Narubia wrote:

because i have the KBD very strong and he will drop ween and santas, and i dont want then to get a buttload of em every time they kill him…and im using kittyscape v2 if that helps[br][size=1]Posted on: September 22, 2007, 06:04:13 PM[/size][hr]so, no halp fore meee?

Read full topic

item.title: Help on npc drops please?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Item2… Obviously you would search for your NPC… I just used a guard as an example… Few more

public static int GreaterDemon[] = {1247,1201,1073,1365};

    public static int randomGreaterDemon()
    {
    	return GreaterDemon[(int)(Math.random()*GreaterDemon.length)];
    }
public static int Zombie[] = {556,1139,199,882,1349,1351,561,1291,313};

    public static int randomZombie()
    {
    	return Zombie[(int)(Math.random()*Zombie.length)];
    }
public static int WhiteKnight[] = {1375,1207,1141,1203,1619};

    public static int randomWhiteKnight()
    {
    	return WhiteKnight[(int)(Math.random()*WhiteKnight.length)];
    }

Should get the idea.

Read full topic

item.title: Help on npc drops please?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Look @ my post…

public static int Guard[] = {1291,1101,1203,440,1935};
The, 1291,1101,1203,440,1935, are the ItemIDS.. If you look under it, it says "RANDOMGUARD".. Which means its a random drop between those items..

item.title: Help on npc drops please?
item.dc:creator: @X-J-K-X X-J-K-X
item.description:
@X-J-K-X wrote:

Nah, its either in, Item2, Item3… I was looking through last night, and i found the drops for my NPC’s…

public static int Guard[] = {1291,1101,1203,440,1935};

    public static int randomGuard()
    {
    	return Guard[(int)(Math.random()*Guard.length)];
    }

Yeah thats Item2.

H2H
